data.title: Ben Kingsley Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Ben Kingsley with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Grew up thinking he would become a doctor, like his father, but wound up becoming an actor, like his mother

Made his TV debut in 1966, in the British soap Coronation Street

Made his London stage debut in 1966, in a musical produced by Beatles manager Brian Epstein, and was offered a recording contract by Beatles recording manager Dick James, but declined

Became a member of the Royal Shakespeare Company in 1967

While researching his title role in Gandhi (1982), he discovered he had paternal ancestors that hailed from the same village as Mahatma Gandhi in Gujarat, India

Made his Broadway debut in 1984 in Kean, the one-man show about 19th-century English actor Edmund Kean; his second wife, Alison Sutcliffe, directed

In 2001, it was announced he would be knighted by Queen Elizabeth

Cofounded the U

K

-based production shingle SBK Pictures in 2007

Made his Bollywood film debut in Teen Patti (2010)

Received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2010
